response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, it is worth $15,000 to us. Considering its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000.
